review: Covera-HS (verapamil):Makes me sleepy, then I just fall asleep. Fell asleep while stopped at a stop sign. I was woke up by my daughter. As she was in the back seat. The police intervened and they called an ambulance. It was a very scary situation. My blood sugar was tested and was 53! I surrendered my driver's licence.I no longe a star driver.
